title: What kind of project can I do using ServiceNow to learn the basics? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can complete the Training courses from following ServiceNow link: https://developer.servicenow.com/app.do#!/training/landing?v=helsinki First complete these two courses in order then you can jump on to others courses. 1. Building the Marketing Event application 2. Coding on ServiceNow This will help you to build custom application ‘Marketing Event’ and learn basics of servicenow administration and coding. Remember you need to get a developer instance to practice this which is free of cost from servicenow.
